event.title: established the towns of Reading and Wilmont in 1899

data.event: The railroad established the towns of Reading and Wilmont in 1899.

event.title: Saturday, June 9, 1900, construction of the town immediately commenced

data.event: When the railroad reached present-day Lismore at 3:00 pm on Saturday, June 9, 1900, construction of the town immediately commenced.
The Bank of Lismore opened its doors on September 1, 1900, and was incorporated as the State Bank of Lismore three months later.

event.title: was incorporated as the State Bank of Lismore three months later

data.event: The Bank of Lismore opened its doors on September 1, 1900, and was incorporated as the State Bank of Lismore three months later.
A school house, churches, several businesses, and many residences were constructed in 1901.
